title: Schedule a Property Showing
description: A buyer client wants to see a property tomorrow afternoon. The agent must coordinate with the listing agent to schedule a showing.

tasks.description: Identify the property the buyer wants to see and retrieve the listing agent's contact information from the MLS.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly identifies the target property and listing agent.

tasks.description: Contact the listing agent with the requested showing time (tomorrow, 2-3 PM).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent sends a clear request to the listing agent.

tasks.description: Receive confirmation from the listing agent and update the buyer client's calendar with the appointment details.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully confirms the showing and updates the client's calendar.
